ComicInfo.Title: Nobody Beats The Enforcer!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ghost Rider: Johnny Blaze makes a mad dash escape! Will Karen Page say “yes” to Johnny’s offer?
*Notes* John Romita Sr. did some alterations to Ghost Rider on the cover.Features the Hostess Fruit Pies ad, The Incredible Hulk And The Green Thumb
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 10:30:10. [CVDB17183]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Don Heck, Don Heck, Jack Kirby, John Romita
ComicInfo.Inker: Keith Pollard, Al Milgrom, John Romita
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Al Milgrom, Irving Watanabe, Jack Kirby, John Romita
ComicInfo.Characters: Carson Collier Sr., Charles L. Delazny, Enforcer (Delazny), Ghost Rider (Blaze), Karen Page, Roxanne Simpson Blaze, Stunt-Master, Zarathos
